title: Bahati Binti Mfalme
description: Nchi anayoishi Bahati inakabiliwa na tatizo kubwa. Lakini Bahati ana wazo ambalo linaweza kutatua tatizo hilo. Je, Mfalme na washauri watasililiza ushauri wa Bahati?
chapters: [{"image":{"id":144},"sortOrder":0,"id":323,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bahati aliishi katika nchi ya Sususu. Alikuwa binti wa mfalme. Wazazi wake walikuwa watawala wa Sususu.","sortOrder":0,"id":578}]},{"image":{"id":145},"sortOrder":1,"id":324,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Mvua haikunyesha kwa muda. Nchi ya Sususu ilikabiliwa na ukame kwa muda mrefu. Watu hawakuwa na chakula wala maji.","sortOrder":0,"id":579},{"originalText":"Mimea ilikauka. Wanyama walitaabika bila maji.","sortOrder":1,"id":580}]},{"image":{"id":146},"sortOrder":2,"id":325,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Taabu za wanasususu zilifika kwa mfalme. Mfalme na washauri waliwaza wafanye nini. Waliitisha kikao kujadili hali ile.","sortOrder":0,"id":581}]},{"image":{"id":147},"sortOrder":3,"id":326,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bahati alipenda kukaa karibu na baba yake mfalme wa Sususu. Alihudhuria vikao alivyofanya mfalme na washauri wake.","sortOrder":0,"id":582}]},{"image":{"id":148},"sortOrder":4,"id":327,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Mfalme alipojadili tatizo la ukame na washauri wake, Bahati naye aliwaza afanye nini kutatua matatizo ya nchi ya Sususu.","sortOrder":0,"id":583}]},{"image":{"id":149},"sortOrder":5,"id":328,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bahati alipata wazo. Alitaka kumwambia baba yake, lakini hakumpa nafasi kwa sababu Bahati alikuwa mdogo sana.","sortOrder":0,"id":584}]},{"image":{"id":150},"sortOrder":6,"id":329,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bahati alikwenda kwa mama yake, ambaye alikuwa malkia wa Sususu.","sortOrder":0,"id":585},{"originalText":"Malkia alimsikiliza na kuahidi kumsaidia.","sortOrder":1,"id":586}]},{"image":{"id":151},"sortOrder":7,"id":330,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Malkia alikwenda kwa mfalme na washauri wake. Aliwasihi wasikilize wazo la Bahati.","sortOrder":0,"id":587}]},{"image":{"id":152},"sortOrder":8,"id":331,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Mfalme wa Sususu alimpa Bahati nafasi ya kuongea mbele ya washauri. Bahati alisimama mbele ya baraza lile na kueleza wazo lake.","sortOrder":0,"id":588}]},{"image":{"id":153},"sortOrder":9,"id":332,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Aliwaeleza watu wa Sususu wazuie maji ya mvua. Wasiyaache yote yaelekee mtoni. Kisha wachimbe bwawa la kuyahifadhi.","sortOrder":0,"id":589}]},{"image":{"id":154},"sortOrder":10,"id":333,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Pia, wazuie maji ya mto na kuyaelekeza bwawani. Maji ya bwawani yatawasaidia hasa kipindi cha ukame.","sortOrder":0,"id":590},{"originalText":"Mfalme na washauri walifurahishwa na wazo la Bahati. Walipanga kuwaeleza wananchi wa Sususu ili walitekeleze.","sortOrder":1,"id":591}]},{"image":{"id":155},"sortOrder":11,"id":334,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Bahati aliwaongoza vijana wa Sususu. Walichimba bwawa kubwa. Wengine walichimba mifereji kuelekea bwawani.","sortOrder":0,"id":592}]},{"image":{"id":156},"sortOrder":12,"id":335,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Mvua ziliponyesha, mifereji ilipeleka maji bwawani. Mto nao ulitiririsha maji bwawani. Bwawa lilikuwa na maji ya kutosha.","sortOrder":0,"id":593}]},{"image":{"id":157},"sortOrder":13,"id":336,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Maji yalifika Sususu. Watu walipata maji. Mimea ilinyeshewa. Wanyama walipata majani na maji. Bahati, Mfalme, Malkia na watu wote wa Sususu walifurahi sana.","sortOrder":0,"id":594}]}]

title: Chura na Nyota
description: Chura anapenda kutazama nyota. Usiku mmoja alitaka kuzigusa nyota. Alikwea kwenye jiwe, juu ya mti wa mnazi na hata kwenye kilima! Nyota zilikuwa mbali sana. Je, Chura atapata fursa ya kuwa karibu na nyota?
chapters: [{"image":{"id":128},"sortOrder":0,"id":308,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Chura alipenda sana kutazama nyota. Alitaka kuruka na kuzigusa nyota.","sortOrder":0,"id":563},{"originalText":"Usiku mmoja, aliamua kuzigusa nyota!","sortOrder":1,"id":564}]},{"image":{"id":129},"sortOrder":1,"id":309,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Alipanda juu ya jiwe kubwa. Alijaribu kuzifikia nyota. Nyota zilikuwa juu sana. Zilikuwa mbali, mbali sana.","sortOrder":0,"id":565}]},{"image":{"id":130},"sortOrder":2,"id":310,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Baadaye aliona kilima. Akakwea kilima kwa haraka sana. Akanyoosha mikono yake juu. Hakuweza kuzifikia nyota.","sortOrder":0,"id":566}]},{"image":{"id":131},"sortOrder":3,"id":311,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Chura aliona mti wa mnazi karibu naye. Ulikuwa mrefu sana. Akawaza kuwa sasa nitafanikiwa.","sortOrder":0,"id":567}]},{"image":{"id":132},"sortOrder":4,"id":312,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Akaanza kuukwea ule mti wa mnazi. Aliukwea kwa shida sana.","sortOrder":0,"id":568}]},{"image":{"id":133},"sortOrder":5,"id":313,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Akanyoosha mikono yake juu....Lakini nyota zilikuwa mbali sana.","sortOrder":0,"id":569}]},{"image":{"id":134},"sortOrder":6,"id":314,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Chura alivunjika moyo sana. Akatazama chini. Moyo wake ukadunda kwa woga.","sortOrder":0,"id":570}]},{"image":{"id":135},"sortOrder":7,"id":315,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Akaweka mikono kifuani na kusema, \"Sitaogopa. Nitaweza kuzigusa nyota!","sortOrder":0,"id":571}]},{"image":{"id":136},"sortOrder":8,"id":316,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Mara aliona kidimbwi cha maji. Nyota zilikuwa zinametameta kwenye maji.","sortOrder":0,"id":572}]},{"image":{"id":137},"sortOrder":9,"id":317,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Akatazama nyota kwa furaha. Alijitosa kwenye maji.","sortOrder":0,"id":575}]},{"image":{"id":140},"sortOrder":12,"id":320,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Alitoka kwenye maji na kukaa kwenye ukingo wa kidimbwi kile.","sortOrder":0,"id":576}]},{"image":{"id":141},"sortOrder":13,"id":321,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Akaketi na kutazama nyota zikimetameta kwenye kidimbwi.","sortOrder":0,"id":577}]}]
